abstract.t: This document specifies DIS options that enrich the potentialbehavior of the Routing Protocol for Low Power and Lossy Networks(RPL) specified in [I-D.ietf-roll-rpl].The goal is to enable new leaf nodes to quickly discover and attachto the routing structure, without having to wait for spontaneous DIOtransmissions by neighbour routers and without causing them to resettheir DIO timers.
